pkgmetadata.longdescription: Super simple wallpaper application for Wayland compositors implementing the layer-shell protocol. Wbg takes a single command line argument: a path to an image file. This image is displayed scaled-to-fit on all monitors. More display options, and/or the ability to set a per-monitor wallpaper may be added in the future.
